meanings.def: a business or an organization that provides a particular service especially when representing other businesses or organizations
examples: She works for an advertising agency.
through an agency He managed to find a job through an agency.
I've signed up with a temping agency.
Details of the problem will be logged by the Help Desk staff who will then contact the appropriate agency.

meanings.def: a government department that provides a particular service
examples: Some laboratories are operated by government agencies.

meanings.def: as a result of the action of somebody/something
examples: He obtained his position through the agency of an old friend.

idioms.def: as a result of the action of somebody/something
examples: He obtained his position through the agency of an old friend.

related: United States Agency for International Development
